name: FINDING SIREN HEAD
description:
CONTROLS -

A - Left

D - Right

Left Mouse action

Hello this is my first horror game well first that I have posted. It is about trying to find siren head. You are out in the woods with a gun searching to find him when you shoot him it does not kill him but stuns him he runs off the you go home and go out the next day to find him. I made it in 2 days on Html, CSS, And JS.
